trait.name: False Object
trait.text: If the broom is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the broom move or act, that creature must succeed on a 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the broom is animate.

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The broom doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The broom makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Broomstick
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: False Object
trait.text: If the library is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the library move or act, that creature must succeed on a 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the library is animate.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The library makes two attacks.

action.name: Chained Book
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 12).

monster.name: Arrant Quill

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Quill casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (save 17):
At will: light, mage hand, prestidigitation
3/day each: detect magic, dispel magic, faerie fire, hold monster
1/day each: mind blank, teleport

monster.spells: Light,Mage Hand,Prestidigitation,Detect Magic,Dispel Magic,Faerie Fire,Hold Monster,Mind Blank,Teleport

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Quill makes two attacks with his dagger and uses Supreme Mockery.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Quill's Fable (Recharge 6)
action.text: Quill utters a short fable while targeting up to five creatures within 30 feet of him that he can see. Each target that can hear Quill's magical fable must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Supreme Mockery
action.text: Quill hurls a string of insults laced with enchantments at a creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the creature can hear Quill (though it need not understand him), it must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 66 (12d10) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
trait.text: If Bak Mei fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Special Equipment
trait.text: Bak Mei carries a staff of striking with 10 charges.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
trait.text: While Bak Mei is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Bak Mei attacks three times: twice with Thunder Strike and once with his staff of striking.

action.name: Thunder Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) thunder damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be deafened and stunned until the start of Bak Mei's next turn.

action.name: Staff of Striking
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and Bak Mei can expend up to 3 of the staff's charges. For each expended charge, the target takes an extra 1d6 force damage.

action.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
action.text: Bak Mei regains 2d8 + 4 hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on him.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
reaction.text: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Bak Mei deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by 1d10 + 12. If the damage is reduced to 0, Bak Mei catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Bak Mei has a hand free.

legendary.name: Crane Dance
legendary.text: Bak Mei moves up to 20 feet. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Thunder Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Bak Mei uses Thunder Strike.

trait.name: Limited Spell Immunity
trait.text: The golem automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 7th level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The golem makes two attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) force damage.

action.name: Crystal Dart
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) force damage.

reaction.name: Spell Deflection
reaction.text: In response to a spell attack missing the golem, it causes that spell to hit another creature within 120 feet of it that it can see.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The chwinga's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:
At will: druidcraft, guidance, pass without trace, resistance

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The chwinga doesn't require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a handful of flower petals, a cloud of pollen, a stone statuette resembling its former self, a tiny sphere of smooth stone, or a puddle of fresh water (your choice).

trait.name: Magic Gift (1/Day)
trait.text: The chwinga targets a humanoid it can see within 5 feet of it. The target gains a supernatural charm of the DM's choice. See chapter 7 of the Dungeon Masters Guide for more information on supernatural charms.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The ghost casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability and requiring no material components:
At will: fog cloud
3/day: telekinesis
1/day: control weather

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
trait.text: The ghost can see 120 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The ghost regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the ghost takes radiant damage or damage from a magic weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of the ghost's next turn. The ghost dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ghost makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Spectral Weapon
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) force damage.

action.name: Etherealness
action.text: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Wind Howl (Recharge 6)
action.text: The ghost emits a dreadful howl that summons a cold, biting wind. This wind engulfs up to three creatures of the ghost's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target is pulled up to 20 feet toward the ghost and must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The commoner doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. When it drops to 0 hit points, it becomes a lifeless object.

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The avatar makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (8d6 + 4) necrotic damage.

action.name: Horn
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (8d6 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be transformed into a wolf under the avatar's control. This transformation lasts for 1 hour, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies. The target's game statistics are replaced by the wolf's statistics, but it retains its hit points. The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its wolf form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other action that requires hands or speech. The target's gear melds into the new form, and it can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon tortoise makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one tail attack in place of its two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon tortoise and knocked prone.

action.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon tortoise exhales abrasive sand in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 52 (15d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Faerl has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Rapier
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: Faerl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, he must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Fungal Servant
monster.immune: necrotic,poison,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The fungal servant is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The fungal servant has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st Level (4 slots): command, guiding bolt, shield of faith
2nd Level (3 slots): hold person, silence, spiritual weapon
3rd Level (3 slots): animate dead, dispel magic
4th Level (3 slots): divination, guardian of faith
5th Level (2 slots): contagion, insect plague
6th Level (1 slots): harm

monster.spells: Sacred Flame,Thaumaturgy,Command,Guiding Bolt,Shield of Faith,Hold Person,Silence,Spiritual Weapon,Animate Dead,Dispel Magic,Divination,Guardian of Faith,Contagion,Insect Plague,Harm

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The fungal servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
trait.text: A destroyed fungal servant gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the fungal servant's heart.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The fungal servant can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to spores. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
action.text: The fungal servant targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the fungal servant, it must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the fungal servant's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all fungal servants for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
legendary.text: The fungal servant makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary.name: Blinding Spores
legendary.text: Blinding spores swirls magically around the fungal servant. Each creature within 5 feet of the fungal servant must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary.name: Blasphemous Word (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The fungal servant utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the fungal servant that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the fungal servant's next turn.

legendary.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The fungal servant magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the fungal servant, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the fungal servant's next turn.

legendary.name: Whirlwind of Spores (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The fungal servant magically transforms into a whirlwind of spores, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the fungal servant is immune to all damage, and it can't be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, or stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the fungal servant remain in its possession.

monster.name: Gingwatzim
monster.speed: 30 ft., fly 30 ft. (hover) in its true form only

trait.name: Alternate Forms
trait.text: The gingwatzim has two alternate forms, both of which are chosen by its creator when the gingwatzim comes into being. One form is an exact duplicate of a Tiny nonmagical object (such as a book, dagger, or gemstone) that its creator is carrying or wearing when the gingwatzim is conjured. The other form can be any Tiny beast. Once these alternate forms are chosen, they can't be changed.

action.name: Energy Drain (True Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion. When the target finishes a short or long rest, the target loses every level of exhaustion gained from this attack.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: The gingwatzim changes from its true form—a 3-foot-diameter sphere of luminous ectoplasm—into one of its two alternate forms, or from one of those forms back into its true form. In object form, it can't move or make attacks but otherwise retains its statistics, and it is indistinguishable from the thing it is imitating. In beast form, it retains its hit points but otherwise uses the stat block of the beast it is imitating. When it dies, the gingwatzim reverts to its true form and then vanishes.

monster.name: Grippli Warrior
monster.languages: Grippli plus one other language (usually Common, Draconic, or Primordial)

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The grippli can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The grippli can leap 30 feet horizontally or 20 feet vertically from a standing position.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The grippli makes one attack with its tongue. If this attack hits, the grippli can make a melee attack using its trident against the same target.

action.name: Tongue
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The target is grappled (escape 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the grippli can't grab another creature.

action.name: Trident
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Hag of the Fetid Gaze

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery

trait.name: Shared Spellcasting
trait.text: While all three members of the Fetid Gaze are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
1st level (4 slots): charm person, witch bolt
2nd level (3 slots): alter self, suggestion
3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, glyph of warding, slow
4th level (3 slots): blight, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): dominate person, seeming
6th level (1 slot): Otto's irresistible dance

monster.spells: Dancing Lights,Minor Illusion,Vicious Mockery,Charm Person,Witch Bolt,Alter Self,Suggestion,Dispel Magic,Glyph of Warding,Slow,Blight,Polymorph,Dominate Person,Seeming,Otto's Irresistible Dance

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
action.text: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Invisible Passage
action.text: The hag magically turns invisible until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While invisible, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is invisible with her.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
trait.text: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The monk makes two attacks.

action.name: Force Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Dart
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
trait.text: While Jade Tigress is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Jade Tigress makes three attacks.

action.name: Force Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the of Jade Tigress's next turn.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

action.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
action.text: Jade Tigress regains 2d8 + 2 hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on her.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
reaction.text: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Jade Tigress deflects the missile. The damage she takes from the attack is reduced by 1d10 + 9. If the damage is reduced to 0, Jade Tigress catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Jade Tigress has a hand free.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: K'Tulah is a 4th-level spellcaster. K'Tulah's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). K'Tulah has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
1st Level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave
2nd Level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin

trait.name: Feline Agility
trait.text: When K'Tulah moves on her turn in combat, she can double her speed until the end of the turn. Once she uses this ability, K'Tulah can't use it again until she moves 0 feet on one of her turns.

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The kiddywidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the kiddywidget (escape 8).

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning damage.

monster.name: Lichen Lich

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The lich casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (save 19):
At will: druidcraft
3/day each: detect magic, fog cloud, pass without trace
1/day each: antilife shell, dispel magic, speak with plants, transport via plants

monster.spells: Druidcraft,Detect Magic,Fog Cloud,Pass without Trace,Antilife Shell,Dispel Magic,Speak with Plants,Transport via Plants,Fire Storm

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
trait.text: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The lich makes four attacks.

action.name: Poisonous Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Wither
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

action.name: Fire Storm (7th-Level Spell; 1/Day)
action.text: The lich fills up to ten 10-foot cubes with fire. Every cube must be within 150 feet of the lich and occupy a space the lich can see, and each cube must have at least one face adjacent to the face of another cube. Each creature in the area must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 (7d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried. If the lich chooses, plant life in the area is unaffected by the spell.

legendary.name: Attack
legendary.text: The lich makes an attack.

legendary.name: Poison Prick (Cost 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The lich targets one poisoned creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious until the poisoned condition ends on it.

legendary.name: Sap Life (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The lich targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. The lich regains a number of hit points equal to the amount of damage that the creature takes.

monster.name: Lightning Golem
monster.immune: lightning,poison,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
trait.text: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
trait.text: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) lightning damage.

monster.name: Master Sage

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The sage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks):
At will: light, mage hand, mending, prestidigitation
3/day each: comprehend languages, detect magic, dispel magic, identify, levitate, locate object, Tenser's Floating Disk, unseen servant
1/day each: banishment, contact other plane, Drawmij's instant summons, legend lore, locate creature, planar binding, polymorph, protection from evil and good, scrying, sending, true seeing

monster.spells: Light,Mage Hand,Mending,Prestidigitation,Shocking Grasp,Comprehend Languages,Detect Magic,Dispel Magic,Fireball,Identify,Levitate,Locate Object,Shield,Tenser's Floating Disk,Unseen Servant,Banishment,Contact Other Plane,Drawmij's Instant Summons,Legend Lore,Locate Creature,Planar Binding,Polymorph,Protection from Evil and Good,Scrying,Sending,True Seeing

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Fireball (3rd-Level Spell; 3/Day)
